adjective.description: Relating to the time before something is made available for purchase.
examples: presale tickets for the gig went on sale earlier this week

adjective.description: Relating to the time before a period when goods are sold at reduced prices.

noun.description: A sale held or made before an item is made generally available for purchase.
examples: we bought our tickets through a presale six months prior to the concert
the product is available now for presale
